mapper.sql: CLASS_PHOTO.ID CLASSPHOTO_ID, CLASS_PHOTO.PARTNER_ID CLASSPHOTO_PARTNERID, CLASS_PHOTO.IMG_URL CLASSPHOTO_IMGURL, CLASS_PHOTO.TITLE CLASSPHOTO_TITLE, CLASS_PHOTO.DESCRIPTION CLASSPHOTO_DESCRIPTION, CLASS_PHOTO.LAST_MODIFY_TIME CLASSPHOTO_LASTMODIFYTIME, CLASS_PHOTO.CREATE_TIME CLASSPHOTO_CREATETIME, CLASS_PHOTO.ENABLED CLASSPHOTO_ENABLED, CLASS_PHOTO.DELETED CLASSPHOTO_DELETED
COURSE.ID COURSE_ID, COURSE.COURSE_NAME COURSE_COURSENAME, COURSE.COURSE_TEMPLATE_ID COURSE_COURSETEMPLATEID
COURSE_CLASS_PHOTO.ID COURSECLASSPHOTO_ID, COURSE_CLASS_PHOTO.COURSE_ID COURSECLASSPHOTO_COURSEID, COURSE_CLASS_PHOTO.CLASS_PHOTO_ID COURSECLASSPHOTO_CLASSPHOTOID
mapper.insert:
insert into CLASS_PHOTO
PARTNER_ID,
IMG_URL,
TITLE,
DESCRIPTION,
LAST_MODIFY_TIME,
CREATE_TIME,
ENABLED,
DELETED,
#{partnerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lastModifyTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
#{createTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
#{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update:
update CLASS_PHOTO
PARTNER_ID = #{partnerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IMG_URL = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_MODIFY_TIME = #{lastModifyTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
ENABLED = #{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(ID) from CLASS_PHOTO where DELETED = 0

SELECT
FROM CLASS_PHOTO where CLASS_PHOTO.PARTNER_ID = #{partnerId} and CLASS_PHOTO.DELETED = 0

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT
FROM CLASS_PHOTO where CLASS_PHOTO.PARTNER_ID = #{partnerId} and CLASS_PHOTO.DELETED = 0 ) AS total

SELECT
FROM CLASS_PHOTO CLASS_PHOTO JOIN COURSE_CLASS_PHOTO COURSE_CLASS_PHOTO ON CLASS_PHOTO.ID = COURSE_CLASS_PHOTO.CLASS_PHOTO_ID JOIN COURSE COURSE ON COURSE.ID = COURSE_CLASS_PHOTO.COURSE_ID WHERE COURSE.ID = #{courseId} and CLASS_PHOTO.DELETED = 0

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT
FROM CLASS_PHOTO CLASS_PHOTO JOIN COURSE_CLASS_PHOTO COURSE_CLASS_PHOTO ON CLASS_PHOTO.ID = COURSE_CLASS_PHOTO.CLASS_PHOTO_ID JOIN COURSE COURSE ON COURSE.ID = COURSE_CLASS_PHOTO.COURSE_ID WHERE COURSE.ID = #{courseId} and CLASS_PHOTO.DELETED = 0 )AS total

SELECT
FROM CLASS_PHOTO CLASS_PHOTO JOIN COURSE_TEMPLATE_CLASS_PHOTO COURSE_TEMPLATE_CLASS_PHOTO ON CLASS_PHOTO.ID = COURSE_TEMPLATE_CLASS_PHOTO.CLASS_PHOTO_ID JOIN COURSE_TEMPLATE COURSE_TEMPLATE ON COURSE_TEMPLATE.ID = COURSE_TEMPLATE_CLASS_PHOTO.COURSE_TEMPLATE_ID WHERE COURSE_TEMPLATE.ID = #{courseTempleteId} and CLASS_PHOTO.DELETED = 0

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT
FROM CLASS_PHOTO CLASS_PHOTO JOIN COURSE_TEMPLATE_CLASS_PHOTO COURSE_TEMPLATE_CLASS_PHOTO ON CLASS_PHOTO.ID = COURSE_TEMPLATE_CLASS_PHOTO.CLASS_PHOTO_ID JOIN COURSE_TEMPLATE COURSE_TEMPLATE ON COURSE_TEMPLATE.ID = COURSE_TEMPLATE_CLASS_PHOTO.COURSE_TEMPLATE_ID WHERE COURSE_TEMPLATE.ID = #{courseTempleteId} and CLASS_PHOTO.DELETED = 0 ) AS total
